title: Telling Hands
description: A quiet and sensitive girl, Jamie, out of necessity becomes an observant 'moment collector.' She has many setbacks on her road to self-discovery growing up in the Deep South. Jamie faces challenges, both common and unique, including tornadoes, a car accident, and suffering from memory loss on her passionate journey and life long struggle for answers. She is compelled to find out why she feels so different and along the way finds the answer may possibly lie in both her personality and in her DNA memory before she can feel complete.
author: Jamie Godwin Brooks
